title: 6 Pairs Polar Fleece Children's Ski Gloves Winter Gloves Toddler Fleece Mittens
features: What you will receive: the package contains 6 pairs of kid's sherpa lined mittens available in a variety of colors, bright and classic colors can match with different clothes of your kids

Fine workmanship: our boys fleece mittens are made of polar fleece material, soft to touch and friendly to baby's delicate skin, easy to wash and will not break or fade easily, can be worn for a long time, giving your kids a comfortable wear experience

Thoughtful design: there is an elastic cuff of fleece glove mitten so that it can fit babies' wrists well, and kids can adjust the tightness of it, easy to put on or take off, which will make them feel not so tight

Keep warmth: these toddler winter gloves can fit kids' wrists well and keep cold air or wind from entering, so they can keep their hands warm in cold days and allow them with enough capacity to move, a good companion for little child

Applicable occasions: wearing these kids fleece mittens can make little kids more stylish and attractive, and they are chic accessories in the baby's wardrobe; In addition, they are suitable for daily wear, outdoor playing, picnics, camping, snow fights, skiing and other activities in winter or cold weather
description: Features:  Winter outdoor supply: These kids fleece black mittens measure approx. 8.4 x 16 cm/ 3.31 x 6.30 inches, a proper size for most boys and girls aged 2-5. Besides, featuring lightweight and practical functions, they can highlight your cuteness while providing you with warmth.  Delicate present: You can send these toddler fleece gloves to your kids, other family members, relatives, friends and those who have kids to allow them to have a warm winter, protecting their little hands.  Specifications: Material: polar fleece Color: as pictures show Lining color: white Size: about 3.31 x 6.30 inches Quantity: 6 pairs  Package includes: 6 Pairs toddler fleece mittens  Note: Manual measurement, please allow slight errors on size.
